laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased to 7.0 percent on Day 2, 3.2 percent on Day 3, and 1.3 percent at the end of operation.
Noted that the pH improved to 7.35 by Day 3.

changes_over_time.Hematocrit (%): Decreased to 43.5 on Day 3, 31.4 on Day 5, and 26.9 on Day 6.
changes_over_time.Hemoglobin (g/dl): Decreased to 14.9 on Day 3, 10.5 on Day 5, and 9.1 on Day 6.
changes_over_time.White cells (per mm3): Increased to 28,100 on Day 3, then decreased to 16,500 on Day 5 and 9,800 on Day 6.
changes_over_time.Platelets (per mm3): Decreased to 209,000 on Day 3, 125,000 on Day 5, and 59,000 on Day 6.

changes_over_time.Bilirubin: Total peaked at 2.9 on Day 26, then decreased to 0.8 on Day 47.
changes_over_time.Creatinine: Decreased to 1.0 on Day 26 and 0.4 on Day 47.
